name: Lunulata-4b
flavor_text: I warn of the last moment.

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description:
Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped. 
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

perks.description:
Durable yet light bowstring.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Agile Bowstring

perks.description:
Stable, high-friction bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Tactile String

perks.description:
Excellent snapback.
  •  Decreases accuracy
  •  Faster draw time
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Elastic String

perks.description:
Light and easy to draw.
  •  Slightly faster draw time
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Flexible String

perks.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: High Tension String

perks.description:
Simple balanced string.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Natural String

perks.description:
Unbreakable bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly faster draw time
perks.name: Polymer String

perks.description:
Light and stable shaft material. 
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Carbon Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Thinner arrows to increase nocking speed and weapon handling.
  •  Increases handling speed 
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Compact Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Heavy and consistent. 
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: Fiberglass Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Aerodynamic and light. 
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Helical Fletching

perks.description:
Feather-light with good control.
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Greatly increases stability
perks.name: Natural Fletching

perks.description:
Modern fletching for straight paths. 
  •  Increases accuracy
perks.name: Straight Fletching

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.
perks.name: No Distractions

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. While this buff is active, grenade or melee kills of the same damage type greatly increase its damage and duration.
perks.name: Golden Tricorn

perks.description: Precision final blows spawn a Stasis crystal at the victim's location.
perks.name: Headstone

perks.description: Damaging an enemy with this weapon has a small chance to reload the magazine and increase movement speed while aiming down sights. Bows receive faster draw speed and swords receive faster charge rate while this perk is active.
perks.name: Veist Stinger
